title: Tuesday Post Show (04-12-22)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (04-12-22)
description:
Bobby starts with the Top 3 Songs in Country Music. Bobby reveals what “Short King Spring”. Amy shares an update on her son and what he’s currently training for. Bobby talks about an unreleased song from The Raging Idiots called “The Good Ole Days”. Bobby talks about the financial issues he’s been having that made him feel dumb.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
